item.description:
Gather with THE CONDUIT and the HIMALAYAN VOICES for "An Evening of Vibrational Self-Healing." We bring the resonance of yoga to Connecticut, by providing custom vibrational sound journeys. The mediums we use to share our craft are antique Tibetan singing bowls and planetary gongs.

There will be a 20-minute explanation on vibration, intention and positive thinking. Then we give an easy lesson on ringing the Tibetan bowls, after which each participant sits in a zero gravity chair with a pair of Mindfolds, (a special blindfold).

The gong at the feet is tuned to the frequency of the Earth, which restores balance and has a grounding effect. While the gong at the head, is tuned to the frequency of the Sun. This is a mystical sound we like to call the “Sound of Creation”. Other planetary gongs as well as Antique singing bowls and tingshas are used during the session.


Sunday, October 18
5:30-7:30pm

Workshop Fee is $50 (please pre-register)
Contact 860.693.YOGA (9642) or info@yogacentercollinsville.com

Yoga Center of Collinsville
10 Front Street
Collinsville, CT 06019
item.name: An Evening of Vibrational Self-Healing
